source.56d36018:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.edae8750:
def scatter(data,target,n_row,n_col):
    col=data.columns
    fig, ax = plt.subplots(n_row,n_col,figsize=(20,20))
    ax=ax.flatten()
    for i, col in enumerate(col):
        sns.scatterplot(y=target, x=col, ax=ax[i], data=data)
        ax[i].set_ylabel(col)
    plt.show()
